Text:
Thought I would give it a try to see if its as easy as doing it the other way, made my site etc in the predefined sections/folders in photoshop and then when it came to export/publish it, it told me I needed to buy the software to use the billboard function etc.

I wouldn't waste yourself, if your going to make a wordpress theme you mite aswell slice it up yourself in photoshop and code it yourself.
No serial included (and it's not nullified either).
